Producer: Avi Lerner, Kevin King Templeton, Yariv Lerner, Les Weldon
Production Co: Millennium Films, Lionsgate, Campbell Grobman Films
Synopsis: Vietnam War veteran John Rambo tries to find some semblance of peace by raising horses on a ranch in Arizona. He's also developed a special familial bond with a woman named Maria and her teenage granddaughter Gabriela. But when a vicious Mexican cartel kidnaps Gabriela, Rambo crosses the border on a bloody and personal quest to rescue her and punish those responsible.
Title: Rambo: Last Blood
